name: Ludum Dare 38
description:
Try to survive as long as you can by moving around this small world!

Block will try to crush you. You should gather power ups around.

Made in 72 hours by nek0las (@nek0las) and inagun for the Ludum Dare 38 Jam.

Changelog

- 1.0.1 - fix collision issue when restarting the game.
